1.details: Create comprehensive master implementation plan with detailed phase breakdown, sub-plans, checklists, and file structures for the Gabriel Family Clinic healthcare platform.

2.details: Initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, and core dependencies. Set up project structure, configuration files, and development environment.

3.content: Phase 2: Design System & Component Library Foundation
3.details: Implement the tri-tone color palette, typography system, accessibility tokens, and base component architecture following WCAG AAA standards.

4.details: Build elderly-friendly UI components (18px base font, 44px+ touch targets) with Radix UI primitives and Framer Motion animations.

5.details: Implement Supabase database with complete PostgreSQL schema, RLS policies, and edge functions for healthcare operations.

6.details: Develop all healthcare platform pages: appointments, patient records, doctor dashboard, booking system with Singapore localization.

7.details: Implement Supabase Auth with healthcare-compliant security, patient privacy features, and role-based access control.

8.details: Implement healthcare-specific SEO optimization, structured data, performance optimization (<300KB first load), and accessibility testing.

9.details: Implement comprehensive testing suite: Jest unit tests, Playwright E2E tests, axe-core accessibility testing, cross-browser testing.

10.details: Deploy to production with static export optimization, final testing, and deployment validation.
